item.description:
And a big exhale.....

Think about it - After Wednesdays last home game of the season at Fenway, the Red Sox will be going to Baltimore for a 3 game set (Baltimore is just 1 game behind the Yankees) and then they go to the Bronx to finish out the season.The Sox have a lot of influence over the Yankees taking the AL East title this year.

For one final time this season, let's meet to commiserate, talk baseball and try to find some hope for next year.

If you have never been to Who's on First on a game day, Enter Who’s on First from their Brookline Avenue entrance for non-ticketed guests BEFORE, DURING, and AFTER the game.

Who's on First? Who's at shortstop? Who's on the mound?? What a year.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the host/hostess where the Natives are (HINT: Look for the empty shot glasses of Jameson with the tears inside)
item.name: Say farewell to the 2012 Red Sox season. Mercifully.
